greeting.label: Message
greeting.subtitle: Nice to meet you. We are Knot.
greeting.text1: At Knot, we value human connections.
greeting.text2: Through web, apps, design, and prototyping, we aim to create comfortable ties between users, creators, and everyone involved.
greeting.text3: We approach each project with care, valuing not just speed and efficiency, but who we work with and what kind of relationships we build.

philosophy.label: Our Name
philosophy.title: Why "Knot"?
philosophy.text1: Knot means a tie that binds. Even the smallest points become stronger and more meaningful when connected.
philosophy.text2: We aspire to be the ones who carefully connect people with people, ideas with technology, and concepts with society.
philosophy.text3: Knot is not just about creating—it's a name for designing relationships themselves.
